explains: adj. 人际关系的，人际的
wordGroup: interpersonal communication 人际沟通；人际传播；人际交流
interpersonal skill 人际关系技巧，人际交往能力

sentences.en: Training in interpersonal skills is essential.
sentences.cn: 各种人际交往技巧的训练是非常必要的。

sentences.en: Learning how to resolve conflicts helps interpersonal relationships run more smoothly.
sentences.cn: 学习如何解决冲突有助于更顺利地经营人际关系。

sentences.en: But snap decisions in reaction to rapid stimuli aren't exclusive to the interpersonal realm.
sentences.cn: 但是，应对快速刺激而做出的瞬时决策并不专属于人际关系的范畴。
